member.name: T:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.BaseGrabber
member.summary: Simple abstract implementation for .

member.name: T:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.Exceptions.GrabException
member.summary: Base and default class for any exception related to the process of grabbing.

member.name: T:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.Exceptions.GrabParseException
member.summary: Represents grab exceptions that occur when a grabber is trying to parse information on the target page and fails to locate or fetch necessary data from them.
member.remarks: This exception occurs often due to changes on the target server. Therefore, messages for this type of exception are usually technical and not intended to be displayed to final user; use them for diagnosing purposes only.

member.name: T:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.Exceptions.SharpGrabberException
member.summary: Base exception class for all SharpGrabber exceptions

member.name: T:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.Exceptions.UnsupportedGrabException
member.summary: May be thrown when grabbing of a URI is not supported by a grabber or multi-grabber.

member.name: T:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.GrabOptionFlag
member.summary: Flags for grab options

member.name: F:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.GrabOptionFlag.None
member.summary: No grab flags

member.name: F:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.GrabOptionFlag.Decipher
member.summary: Grabber may decipher URIs automatically where necessary.

member.name: F:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.GrabOptionFlag.GrabImages
member.summary: Grabber may grab related images.

member.name: T:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.GrabOptions
member.summary: Describes options for a grab request.

member.name: P:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.GrabOptions.Flags
member.summary: Option flags

member.name: T:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.GrabResult
member.summary: Result of a grab request - is returned by grabbers containing grabbed resources and information obtained from the page.

member.name: P:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.GrabResult.Resources
member.summary: List of grabbed resources

member.name: P:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.GrabResult.Title
member.summary: Subject of the page

member.name: P:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.GrabResult.Description
member.summary: Description of the content

member.name: P:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.GrabResult.CreationDate
member.summary: Optional date and time when this content was created

member.name: P:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.GrabResult.Statistics
member.summary: Optional statistics grabbed from the page

member.name: P:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.GrabResult.IsSecure
member.summary: Whether or not the media is secured. For example, is true if a YouTube video has signature and its download links need to be deciphered.

member.name: T:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.GrabStatisticInfo
member.summary: Contains statistics of a grabbed page e.g. Total views, comments, likes etc. for a YouTube video.
member.remarks: Each property of this class is optional/nullable, as they might not be applicable for different pages or grabbers.

member.name: P:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.GrabStatisticInfo.Author
member.summary: Author name

member.name: P:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.GrabStatisticInfo.ViewCount
member.summary: Total views of the page

member.name: P:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.GrabStatisticInfo.Length
member.summary: Overall length of media if available

member.name: T:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.IGrabbed
member.summary: Represents any grabbed object by an or a .

member.name: P:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.IGrabbed.OriginalUri
member.summary: Link to the original page
member.remarks: Value of this property is not necessarily the same as the URI requested by the user; it may be a cleaner link to the original page, either obtained or generated by its grabber.

member.name: P:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.IGrabbed.ResourceUri
member.summary: Link to the resource found.
member.remarks: Most grabbers return objects that refer to exactly one download link. If a grabber does not refer to any URI or refers to multiple URIs, this property should be null.

member.name: T:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.IGrabber
member.summary: Where implemented, can grab useful resources from certain types of URI. Many objects may be registered on a allowing usage of all grabbers by a single call.
member.remarks: Members of the same instance of object are not expected to be used simultaneously. Status of an active grab is available through .

member.name: P:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.IGrabber.Name
member.summary: Name of the grabber e.g. YouTube

member.name: P:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.IGrabber.Status
member.summary: Reports status and grab progress

member.name: P:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.IGrabber.DefaultGrabOptions
member.summary: Default grab options for this grabber - if none is specified while invoking .

member.name: M:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.IGrabber.Supports(System.Uri)
member.summary: Briefly checks if this grabber supports the specified URI.

member.name: M:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.IGrabber.GrabAsync(System.Uri)
member.summary: Asynchronously looks up the specified URI and grabs useful resources. In case of unsupported URI, NULL should be returned.

member.name: M:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.IGrabber.GrabAsync(System.Uri,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously looks up the specified URI and grabs useful resources. In case of unsupported URI, NULL should be returned.

member.name: M:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.IGrabber.GrabAsync(System.Uri,System.Threading.CancellationToken,DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.GrabOptions)
member.summary: Asynchronously looks up the specified URI and grabs useful resources regarding the specified . In case of unsupported URI, NULL should be returned.

member.name: T:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.Internal.Grabbers.YouTubeGrabber
member.summary: Default for YouTube

member.name: M:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.Internal.Grabbers.YouTubeGrabber.UnmangleEntries(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.String,System.String}},System.Action{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: URL-encoded data are randomly mangled by YouTube. Some entries are merged with other ones separated by comma. This method iterates through the mangled entries and invokes for each real independent entry. Finally, is called supplied with NULL arguments to enforce a final commit.

member.name: M:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.Internal.Grabbers.YouTubeGrabber.ExtractMuxedStreamsMetadata(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.String,System.String}})
member.summary: Gets invoked by to extract muxed streams from metadata.

member.name: M:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.Internal.Grabbers.YouTubeGrabber.ExtractAdaptiveFormatsMetadata(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.String,System.String}})
member.summary: Gets invoked by to extract adaptive_fmts.

member.name: M:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.Internal.Grabbers.YouTubeGrabber.UpdateStreamCipherInfo(DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.Internal.Grabbers.YouTube.YouTubeStreamInfo,System.String)
member.summary:
Accepts as a URI-encoded string in the following form:
sp=sig&s=wggj6zg7m-...&url=https%3A%2F%2Fr5---sn-5hnekn7k.googlevideo.com%2Fvideoplayback... Extracts its useful encoded parameters and puts them into the specified .

member.name: M:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.Internal.Grabbers.YouTubeGrabber.ExtractActualMime(System.String)
member.summary: Given the content type, extracts its pure mime type. For instance, accepts 'video/webm;+codecs=vp9' and returns 'video/webm'.

member.summary: Translates the given JSON object extracted from YouTube to its managed representation.

member.summary: Represents grabbed images

member.summary: Type of the grabbed image e.g. thumbnail, frame etc.

member.name: P:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.Media.GrabbedImage.FrameTime
member.summary: Time of the frame - if is

member.summary: Size of the image - if available

member.summary: Stores grabbed image size

member.name: T:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.Media.GrabbedImageType
member.summary: Defined role of an image grabbed from a page.

member.name: F:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.Media.GrabbedImageType.Primary
member.summary: Indicates that the image is one of the main images (or the only image) of the target media.

member.name: F:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.Media.GrabbedImageType.Thumbnail
member.summary: Indicates that the image is a thumbnail.

member.name: F:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.Media.GrabbedImageType.Frame
member.summary: Indicates that the image is a frame of a video. Using this image type requires specification of the exact time of the frame.

member.name: T:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.Media.GrabbedMedia
member.summary: for media resources, such as audio and video.

member.name: P:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.Media.GrabbedMedia.OriginalUri
member.summary: Original URI - A value of NULL indicates inheritance from .

member.name: P:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.Media.GrabbedMedia.FormatId
member.summary: Optional unique identifier of this format - For YouTube media, this value would be the same as iTag integer number.
member.remarks: If specified, this value should be unique amongst all other grabbed media.

member.name: P:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.Media.GrabbedMedia.Format
member.summary: Contains information about mime type and extension of the media.

member.name: P:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.Media.GrabbedMedia.Channels
member.summary: Defines if this grabbed media contains either audio and/or video channels.

member.name: P:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.Media.GrabbedMedia.Title
member.summary: Full title obtained from source. A value of NULL indicates inheritance from .

member.name: P:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.Media.GrabbedMedia.Length
member.summary: Length of the media (optional)

member.name: P:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.Media.GrabbedMedia.ContentLength
member.summary: Content length (File size) of the target URI (optional)

member.name: P:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.Media.GrabbedMedia.Container
member.summary: Media container name e.g. mp4 (optional)

member.name: P:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.Media.GrabbedMedia.Resolution
member.summary: Media resolution in string format e.g. 720p (optional)

member.name: P:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.Media.GrabbedMedia.BitRateString
member.summary: Media bit rate in string format e.g. 48k (optional)

member.name: P:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.Media.GrabbedMedia.FormatTitle
member.summary:
Suggested name that best describes this media format e.g. MP4 1080p
Can be optionally set by s.

member.summary: Represents stream channels of a media file - audio, video, or both.

member.name: F:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.Media.MediaChannels.None
member.summary: No channel (not for library practical purposes)
member.remarks: No is supposed to return a media with no channels. is there to make flags valid and it might be useful for the user.

member.summary: Video channel

member.summary: Audio channel

member.name: T:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.MultiGrabber
member.summary: Grabs from various sources using grabbers registered on it. Members of this class are thread-safe and can be used simultaneously.
member.remarks: A multi-grabber can grab from several URIs simultaneously because it creates grabbers using registered factories.

member.name: M:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.MultiGrabber.Make(DotNetTools.NExtension.Structures.IFactory{DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.IGrabber})
member.summary: Creates a grabber instance using the specified factory. May be overriden to modify grabber creation behavior. By default, it uses parameterless constructors.

member.name: M:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.MultiGrabber.Register(DotNetTools.NExtension.Structures.IFactory{DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.IGrabber})
member.summary: Registers the specified factory.

member.name: M:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.MultiGrabber.Register``1
member.summary: Registers a simple factory for the specified . The registered factory creates instances of the specified type using its parameterless constructor.

member.name: M:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.MultiGrabber.Unregister(DotNetTools.NExtension.Structures.IFactory{DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.IGrabber})
member.summary: Unregisters the specified factory if previously registered.

member.name: M:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.MultiGrabber.GetGrabbers(System.Uri)
member.summary: Tries to find all compatible grabbers with the specified URI.

member.name: M:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.MultiGrabber.Grab(System.Uri)
member.summary: Transparently grabs information from the specified URI using the registered grabbers.
member.remarks:
This method will return the of the very first successful grab while suppressing exceptions thrown by unsuccessful grab attempts. Throws the last exception thrown by the last used grabber.
Status of the grab is unavailable when using this method because it might automatically make use of multiple compatible grabbers. To have status of the grab, use and grab manually instead.

member.name: M:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.MultiGrabber.CreateDefault
member.summary: Creates an instance of with internal providers registered.

member.summary: Size width

member.summary: Size height

member.name: T:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.WorkStatusType
member.summary: Represents common work status types.

member.name: F:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.WorkStatusType.Initiating
member.summary: The work has just started

member.name: F:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.WorkStatusType.DownloadingPage
member.summary: The grabber is downloading a page - usually the original uri.

member.name: F:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.WorkStatusType.DownloadingFile
member.summary: The grabber is downloading a file.

member.name: F:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.WorkStatusType.ResolvingUri
member.summary: The grabber is resolving one or more URIs.

member.name: F:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.WorkStatusType.Decrypting
member.summary: The grabber is decrypting/deciphering one or more URIs.

member.name: F:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.WorkStatusType.Other
member.summary: Indicates that type of the status is uncommon and a description is provided.

member.name: T:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.WorkStatus
member.summary: Provides status of a task.

member.name: P:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.WorkStatus.Type
member.summary: Work type

member.name: P:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.WorkStatus.Progress
member.summary: Work progress
member.remarks: If work progress is undetermined, value of this property must be NULL.

member.name: P:DotNetTools.SharpGrabber.WorkStatus.Description
member.summary: Description of the status - e.g. "Downloading target url..."

member.summary: Updates properties of the status with a single call.

member.summary: Updates properties of the status with a single call.
